parameters.content:
## WF-WD-04-vPlatinum: 15-Page Expansion

**Purpose:** Expand single-page template to full 15-page vPlatinum website

**Pages Generated:**
1. Home (from WF-WD-04)
2. About
3. Services
4. Contact
5. Gallery
6. Testimonials
7. FAQ
8. Booking
9. Payment
10. Registration
11. Confirmation
12. Invoice
13. Locations
14. Blog
15. Team

**Trigger:** Called by WF-WD-04 after base template is ready

parameters.query: SELECT p.*, pp.page_html as home_html FROM projects p LEFT JOIN project_pages pp ON p.project_ref = pp.project_ref AND pp.page_slug = 'index' WHERE p.project_ref = '{{ $json.body.project_ref }}' LIMIT 1;

parameters.jsCode:
// Generate About Page
const data = $input.first().json;

const prompt = `
### Role
You are a Senior Web Developer creating the ABOUT page for ${data.clientName}.

### Context
- Industry: ${data.industrySector}
- Business Intent: ${data.businessIntent}
- Brand Color: ${data.brandColour}

### Page Requirements
Create a complete About page with:
1. Company history/story section
2. Mission and values
3. Why choose us section
4. Team overview teaser (link to team page)
5. Call to action

### Header (Use exactly as-is)
\`\`\`html
${data.header}
\`\`\`

### Footer (Use exactly as-is)
\`\`\`html
${data.footer}
\`\`\`

### Head Content (Use exactly as-is, update title only)
\`\`\`html
${data.headContent}
\`\`\`

### Navigation Links
Update nav links to: index.html, about.html, services.html, gallery.html, team.html, blog.html, contact.html

### Output
Return ONLY the complete HTML wrapped in \`\`\`html blocks. No explanations.
Use Picsum.photos for images with seed: ${data.project.project_ref}-about
`;

return { json: { prompt, pageData: data.pagesToGenerate[0], ...data } };

parameters.query: INSERT INTO project_pages (project_ref, page_name, page_slug, page_html, page_order, is_generated) VALUES ('{{ $json.project_ref }}', '{{ $json.page_name }}', '{{ $json.page_slug }}', {{ JSON.stringify($json.page_html) }}, {{ $json.page_order }}, {{ $json.is_generated }}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE page_html = VALUES(page_html), is_generated = VALUES(is_generated);

parameters.jsCode:
// Generate Services Page
const data = $('Prepare Page Generation').item.json;

const prompt = `
### Role
You are a Senior Web Developer creating the SERVICES page for ${data.clientName}.

### Context
- Industry: ${data.industrySector}
- Business Intent: ${data.businessIntent}
- Brand Color: ${data.brandColour}

### Page Requirements
Create a complete Services page with:
1. Services overview section
2. Individual service cards (6-8 services)
3. Service details with icons
4. Pricing hints or "Get Quote" CTAs
5. Call to action section

### Header (Use exactly as-is)
\`\`\`html
${data.header}
\`\`\`

### Footer (Use exactly as-is)
\`\`\`html
${data.footer}
\`\`\`

### Navigation
Update nav to: index.html, about.html, services.html, gallery.html, team.html, blog.html, contact.html
Mark services.html as active.

### Output
Return ONLY the complete HTML wrapped in \`\`\`html blocks.
Use Picsum.photos for images with seed: ${data.project.project_ref}-services
`;

return { json: { prompt, pageData: data.pagesToGenerate[1], ...data } };

parameters.query: INSERT INTO project_pages (project_ref, page_name, page_slug, page_html, page_order, is_generated) VALUES ('{{ $json.project_ref }}', '{{ $json.page_name }}', '{{ $json.page_slug }}', {{ JSON.stringify($json.page_html) }}, {{ $json.page_order }}, {{ $json.is_generated }}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE page_html = VALUES(page_html), is_generated = VALUES(is_generated);

INSERT INTO project_pages (project_ref, page_name, page_slug, page_html, page_order, is_generated) VALUES ('{{ $json.project_ref }}', '{{ $json.page_name }}', '{{ $json.page_slug }}', {{ JSON.stringify($json.page_html) }}, {{ $json.page_order }}, {{ $json.is_generated }}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE page_html = VALUES(page_html), is_generated = VALUES(is_generated);

INSERT INTO project_pages (project_ref, page_name, page_slug, page_html, page_order, is_generated) VALUES ('{{ $json.project_ref }}', '{{ $json.page_name }}', '{{ $json.page_slug }}', {{ JSON.stringify($json.page_html) }}, {{ $json.page_order }}, {{ $json.is_generated }}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE page_html = VALUES(page_html), is_generated = VALUES(is_generated);

UPDATE projects SET pages_generated = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM project_pages WHERE project_ref = '{{ $('MySQL - Get Project').item.json.project_ref }}') WHERE project_ref = '{{ $('MySQL - Get Project').item.json.project_ref }}';
